remarks: Implicit substitution of classes for equivalence classes of ordered pairs.  (Contributed by NM, 23-Jul-1995.)
statement:
2ecoptocl.1 $e |- S = ( ( C X. D ) /. R ) $.
2ecoptocl.2 $e |- ( [ <. x , y >. ] R = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
2ecoptocl.3 $e |- ( [ <. z , w >. ] R = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
2ecoptocl.4 $e |- ( ( ( x e. C /\ y e. D ) /\ ( z e. C /\ w e. D ) ) -> ph ) $.
2ecoptocl $p |- ( ( A e. S /\ B e. S ) -> ch ) $.
$d A w x y z $.
$d B w z $.
$d C w x y z $.
$d D w x y z $.
$d R w x y z $.
$d S w z $.
$d ch w z $.
$d ps x y $.
